member.name: M:Avanteam.Values.DataSource.ValueManagerWrapper.GetListTextPathes(Avanteam.Values.DataSource.ValueManagerWrapper,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Builds and returns, for a given hierarchical list of values, a dictionary with the path of the possible "values" and their matching "texts" (for the given language) This process is mandatory to consider all depth levels of hierarchical classes (for the filter management using "Field_OpenKeywordsWithFilter") Ex : in a 3 levels list, considering the A/B/C/D value, the field may contain one of those combinations: - A - A/B - A/B/C - A/B/C/D As well as: - B/C - B/C/D - C/D - B - C - D But not: - A/C - A/D.
member.param: Name of the list of values.
